item.title: Abducted child's father tells BBC he felt helpless as he saw mass Nigerian kidnapping
item.description: The raid on a Catholic school in the West African state came amid a surge in attacks by armed groups.

item.title: Zelensky warns against giving away territory as latest Ukraine talks end
item.description: Talks in Geneva between US and Ukrainian officals have ended with "progress" made - but sticking points remain.

item.title: Daughter of South Africa's ex-president accuses sister of Russia recruitment plot
item.description: Police are investigating allegations that Jacob Zuma's daughter, Duduzile, lured men into fighting in Ukraine.

item.title: Australia senator condemned for burka stunt in parliament
item.description: Pauline Hanson donned a black burka as she sought to push for a ban on the garment.

item.title: Reggae legend Jimmy Cliff dies, aged 81
item.description: The musician was known for hits like You Can Get It If You Really Want and I Can See Clearly Now.
